text: [Music]
like in a balloon is different from from
flying in an aircraft or a helicopter
it's the only type of aircraft that can
continuously fly right on the treeline
and still it's the only aircraft that
can just climb and then drop back down
and you know go with the wind so you
won't find an airplane commercially
flying a 50 feet off the ground
[Music]
you don't have any views or
shock-absorbers you touch the ground and
you just drag a little bit if there's no
wind you just touch and stop a little
bit of in little rebounds and and stop
little bit more when you continue
dragging after the basket tip so on its
side it might not normal and you'll end
up on your side for the landing here you
have the villages that come over and not
just one or two of them you'd have a few
hundreds of them if you land closer to a
village you'll have four or five hundred
of them and it's actually quite a quite
an experience to have everybody around
the balloon
